TopicTitle: Header code visible under "My Profile" page

Articles.Content:
Looks like a comment line in the header is being parsed.

On iPhone 5, safari.

![42AR7PX.jpg](http://imgur.com/42AR7PX.jpg)

Hmm. I am not seeing this. I'm using Chrome.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-14T17:28:16Z" title="04/14/2015 05:28  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 14, 2015</time> by Vanamonde**
Can you reproduce this consistently? It could be a page loading error, and I can't find anything that would cause this.

> 
> Can you reproduce this consistently? It could be a page loading error, and I can't find anything that would cause this.

Reproducible this morning (and only on that page), but not now.

Never mind, glitch in the matrix.
Nothing is surprising considering the forum is running on a collection of very outdated software with more security vulnerabilities and bugs than you can poke a stick at.
